parameters.name: ApiIds
parameters.description: The IDs of APIs that you want to query. Separate multiple API IDs with commas (,). A maximum of 100 API IDs can be entered.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group that you want to query.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The runtime environment of the API. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**
*   **TEST**: the test environment
